wei.series.md.c1.c2.c3 0.9.0
  • Reference

    Random sampler for candidate sets given a data frame.

    md_cand_sampler.Rd

    Candidate set generator. Requires columns for component probabilities e.g., q1,...,qm where qj is the probability that the jth component will be in the corresponding candidate set generated for that observation in the md table.

    md_cand_sampler(df, prob = "q", candset = "x")

    Arguments

    df

    (masked) data frame

    prob

    column prefix for component probabilities, defaults to q, e.g., q1, q2, q3.

    candset

    column prefix for candidate sets (as Boolean matrix), defaults to x, e.g., x1, x2, x3.

    Contents

    Developed by Alexander Towell.
